items.title: Greg Howard
items.content_html:
Ever since I heard you play the Chapman Stick on, my all-time favorite Dave Matthews Band song, The Dreaming Tree, I knew this was the instrument I wanted to learn the most.

Over the following years, thank you for being a friend, and someone for me to ask all the questions when I was learning to play. Thank you for licensing “Big Meadows” to me for a little project I was working on in Austin. Thank you for being an inspiration for me and a countless number of Stick players around the world.

Pancreatic cancer is a bitch, and it’s terrible that we lost you to it.

RIP Greg Howard. You were one in a Googolplex.
items.content_text:
Ever since I heard you play the [Chapman Stick](https://www.stick.com/) on, my all-time favorite Dave Matthews Band song, [The Dreaming Tree](https://open.spotify.com/track/1om1Avyyn1emEctjwvR7Ms?si=c4e2b6bfba74403d), I knew this was the instrument I wanted to learn the most.

Over the following years, thank you for being a friend, and someone for me to ask all the questions when I was learning to play. Thank you for licensing "[Big Meadows](https://open.spotify.com/track/5IVc2q2tD06xC7lXF1zI8t?si=aab9638082f04df4)" to me for a little project I was working on in Austin. Thank you for being an inspiration for me and a countless number of Stick players around the world. 

Pancreatic cancer is a bitch, and it's terrible that we lost you to it.
 
RIP Greg Howard. You were one in a Googolplex.

{{< youtube RCXjEIQANes >}}

items.content_html:
Beautiful day for Mets baseball. I’ve now seen them play in 8 parks around the country. Of course, they beat the A’s 3-2.

It was a good day…
items.content_text: Beautiful day for Mets baseball. I’ve now seen them play in 8 parks around the country. Of course, they beat the A’s 3-2. It was a good day…

items.content_html:
Way more happy than I should be to have my Breville Oracle Touch back from repair.

I almost forgot what a good cup of home brewed coffee tasted like.
items.content_text: Way more happy than I should be to have my [Breville Oracle Touch](https://www.breville.com/us/en/products/espresso/bes990.html) back from repair. I almost forgot what a good cup of home brewed coffee tasted like.

items.content_html:
Fog over the northern Santa Rosa valley, getting on an Avelo flight to Burbank a couple of weeks ago.

(Also testing the new upload feature in the Micro.blog beta.
items.content_text: Fog over the northern Santa Rosa valley, getting on an [Avelo](https://aveloair.com) flight to Burbank a couple of weeks ago. (Also testing the new upload feature in the [Micro.blog](https://micro.blog) beta.

items.content_html: Spent the day at Armstrong Redwoods State Natural Reserve. It was incredible, and surprisingly peaceful.
items.content_text:
Spent the day at [Armstrong Redwoods State Natural Reserve](https://www.parks.ca.gov/?page_id=450). It was incredible, and surprisingly peaceful.

items.title: LA Kings Fanfest 2023
items.content_html:
The rare moment I’m in front of a camera.

Totally worth it to meet my favorite LA Kings player, Pheonix Copley (he’s the starting goalie, and yes…that’s how he spells his name).

This was at the 2023 Kings Fan Fest at the Microsoft Theater (across the street from Staples Cen…I mean Crypto.com Arena).
items.content_text: The rare moment I’m in front of a camera. Totally worth it to meet my favorite LA Kings player, Pheonix Copley (he’s the starting goalie, and yes…that’s how he spells his name). This was at the 2023 Kings Fan Fest at the Microsoft Theater (across the street from Staples Cen…I mean Crypto.com Arena).

items.content_html:
Day in the Life.

LA Kings v. Seattle Kraken @ Crypto.com Arena. 8:37p PDT.
